evidence.claim: Haddon Home Care utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and services.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance throughout their services for health information.
They implement EDI transaction sets for insurance claims processing.
Utilization of FHIR standards for interoperability with healthcare data.
Haddon Home Care employs integration middleware solutions to enhance service delivery.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in X12 EDI transactions, aligns with API development; health tech focus confirms potential need.
